fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
The Polish Chamber of Statutory Auditors belongs to: 
- IFAC (since 2001), 
- Accountancy Europe (former FEE) (since 2002), 
- FIDEF (since 2010), 
- IAAER (since 2010), 
- Common Content Project (since 2015).
goals__remit:
Polish Chamber of Statutory Auditors is a self-regulatory body uniting all statutory auditors (entitled to audit financial statements in Poland). 
The Chamber has been founded on the basis of the Act of 19 October 1991 on audit and publication of financial statements as well as on auditors and their self-regulation which came into force on the 1st of January 1992.
